credit.role: Herself - Member: Buster Shaver and Olive

doc.plot: A musical variety television show that ran on the NBC network from 1950-1955. The show had starred many notable comedians and light entertainers of the era, with Eddie Cantor, Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis as hosts. Several comedians who guest appeared on the show include Fred Allen, Donald O'Connor, Abbott and Costello, Bob Hope, Jimmy Durante and Gordon MacRae.
